data.comment: Millwall kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Duncan Watmore gives Middlesbrough a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 15, Middlesbrough take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Marcus Tavernier.
Goal! Middlesbrough extend their lead to 3-0 through Duncan Watmore.
At Riverside, Marc Bola has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 25, Gary Rowett is making the team's first substitution at Riverside with Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson replacing Alex Pearce.
Middlesbrough kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 58, Shaun Hutchinson is booked for the away team.
Tyler Burey is replacing Troy Parrott for the away team.
Matt Smith is replacing Mason Bennett for Millwall at Riverside.
In the minute 60, Ben Thompson is on a sub for Mahlon Romeo for Millwall.
The home team replace Duncan Watmore with Djed Spence.
Middlesbrough make their second substitution with Britt Assombalonga replacing Chuba Akpom.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Marvin Johnson with Hayden Coulson. This is the third substitution made today by Neil Warnock.
Neil Warnock (Middlesbrough) is making a fourth substitution, with Lewis Wing replacing Marcus Tavernier.
Shane Ferguson is on a sub for Jed Wallace for Millwall.
In the minute 89, Patrick Roberts is replacing Anfernee Dijksteel for the home team.
